page.title: 09Questionnaire.
page.content: We wanted to find out what people thought of{Durrington}and its amenities.10 questions were used and people passing the local Post 0ffice were asked them. Quite a number of the people were housewives.They would like to see more {Grocery Shops}so that the prices became more competitive and they wouldn't have to go to Amesbury to get their shopping. The younger generation wanted a good{Sports Centre}that would include Squash and Badminton Courts.They also wanted to see more equipment in the {Adventure Playground. Many people would like to see a {Chemist}the nearest one is in Amesbury,1.25 km.away. Almost everybody thought Durrington an enjoyable place because of the people who lived there.
